name: Liminal Romance
description:
You awaken in the backrooms and must find a way to escape so you can make it to class on time! Along the way, you encounter several backrooms entities and develop romantic feelings for them. Could this be... blossoming love?!?!

Play Liminal Romance today and find your true love!

This game was made for my senior project. Follow @liminal_romance on twitter to stay updated.
